articles.description: The first female cosmonaut Valentina Tereshkova told a forum she would have been ready to go to the Red Planet herself, if it was not for her age
articles.content: YAROSLAVL, November 21. /TASS/. The first female cosmonaut Valentina Tereshkova said on Monday she believed Russians would be the first to land on Mars and she would have been ready to go to the Red Planet herself, if it was not for her age.Tereshkova made th… [+724 chars]

articles.title: Seven stages of Blood moon total lunar eclipse - The National
articles.description: Night owls and early risers in North America were treated to a rare celestial event on Tuesday as the Earth’s sunset-hued shadow fell across the moon.
articles.content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, FLORIDA // Night owls and early risers in North America were treated to a rare celestial event on Tuesday as the Earths sunset-hued shadow fell across the moon, shifting its colour to bright orange, depending on local weather conditions.

articles.author: Deborah Byrd
articles.title: 1st quarter moon is April 30 | Moon Phases - EarthSky
articles.description: The 1st quarter moon happens on May 30, 2020, at 03:31 UTC. As viewed from anywhere on Earth, a 1st quarter moon is at its highest in the sky at sunset, looking like half a pie.
articles.content: View at EarthSky Community Photos. | Composite image of a moon nearly at 1st quarter with some of the features you can see on the moon at this phase – captured April 30, 2020 – by our friend Dr Ski in the Philippines. He wrote: “… 10 hours before 1st quarter … [+2561 chars]
